html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Black Friday isn't officially here just yet, but the post-Thanksgiving savings are already in full effect on the season's must-have Apple gear. Right now, you can save $60 on the latest model Apple AirPods Pro at Best Buy. This is one of the lowest prices we've ever seen on Apple's popular wireless earbuds—and there's more awesome Apple Black Friday deals where that came from. 

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

The AirPods Pro are among the best wireless earbuds money can buy because, as our reviewer points out, they have active noise cancellation, silicon tips that ensure a comfortable fit and an easy set-up process. Other products like Apple Watches, MacBooks and iPads rarely get big discounts throughout the year, making these pre-Black Friday Apple deals from retailers like Amazon and Best Buy a big win with your wallet.

Currently, AT&T is offering up to $330 off when you buy two Apple Watches through Dec. 2. That means you can buy one Apple Watch for yourself, and get a free Apple Watch SE to gift. Woot is also offering the Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case (new) for $132.99 through November 30 (or until the earbuds sell out—whichever comes first). That's an impressive savings of $66.01. Amazon Prime members can exclusively save an additional $5, bringing the total savings to $71.01.

With days to go until the biggest event of the holiday shopping season, it's likely that prices will continue to fluctuate. Keeping that in mind, if you see a deal you like, it's best to get it while it's still in stock, on sale and wrapped in time for the holidays. Below, we've rounded up the best Apple Black Friday 2021 deals you can get right now. 

The best Apple AirPods Black Friday deals

  • Apple AirPods (2nd Generation) on Amazon for $109.99 (Save $50)
  • New Apple AirPods with Wireless Charging Case from Woot for $132.99 (Save $66.01) ($127.99 for Prime Members—save $77.01 with additional $5 coupon)
  • Apple AirPods Pro with Magsafe Charging Case at Best Buy for $189.99 (Save $60)
  • Apple AirPod Max on Amazon starting at $439.99 (Save up to $109.01)

The best iPad and iPad Pro Black Friday deals 

  • 2021 Apple 11-inch iPad Pro (Wi‐Fi, 128GB) on Amazon for $749.99 (Save $50)
  • 2021 Apple 11-inch iPad Pro (Wi-Fi, 256GB) on Amazon for $849 (Save $50)
  • 2021 Apple 11-inch iPad Pro (Wi-Fi, 1TB) on Amazon for $1,429 (Save $70)

The best Apple Watch Black Friday deals

  • Apple Watch Series 3 (38mm) at Best Buy for $169.99 (Save $30)
  • Apple Watch Series 3 (42mm) at Best Buy for $199.99 (Save $30)
  • Apple Watch SE (GPS, 40mm) on Amazon for $219 (Save $60)
  • Apple Watch Series 6 (GPS, 40mm) Blue Aluminum Case at Walmart for $349 (Save $50)
  • Apple Watch Series 7 (GPS, 41mm) on Amazon for $379.99 (Save $19.01)
  • Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cellular, 40mm) Stainless Steel Case with Milanese Loop on Amazon for $459 (Save $290)
  • Buy one Apple Watch and get one Apple Watch SE at AT&T (Save up to $330)
  • Apple Watch SE (GPS, 40mm) on Amazon for $219 (Save $60)

The best MacBook, iMac and MacBook Air Black Friday deals

  • 2020 Apple Mac Mini with Apple M1 Chip 512GB on Amazon for $779 (Save $120)
  • Apple 21.5-inch iMac Desktop Computer at Best Buy for $999.99 (Save $500)
  • 2020 Apple MacBook Air 13-inch Laptop on Amazon for $1,099.99 (Save $100 at checkout)
  • 2020 Apple iMac with Retina 5K Display 27-inch on Amazon for $1,699 (Save $100)

The best iPhone Black Friday deals

  • Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max for $2.78 per month for 36 months with an unlimited plan and eligible trade-in at AT&T (Save up to $27.78 per month)
  • Apple iPhone 12 Mini at AT&T for $8.75/month (Save $8.75 per month. No trade-in required.)
  • iPhone 13 Mini from $23.34 per month for 30 months when an eligible trade-in at T-Mobile (Save up to $1,000)
  • iPhone SE for $199.99 when you add a new line at T-Mobile (Save $200)
  • Free iPhone SE 64GB for new customers and transfer number within 30 days at Xfinity. Xfinity Internet service required. (Save up to $200)
  • Apple Watch or Apple iPad discounts with online-only iPhone 12 purchase at Verizon (Save up to $250) 
  • Apple iPhone 12 Mini for free with new line, any unlimited plan and eligible trade-in at Verizon (Save up to $599.99)
  • Buy iPhone 12 with an unlimited plan, get another at Verizon (Save up to $699.99)
  • Buy one Apple iPhone 13 mini, get another up to $700 off with limited plan purchase at Verizon (Save up to $800)
  • Buy one Apple iPhone 13, get one up to $800 off at Verizon (Save up to $800)
  • Free Apple iPhone 13 Pro (128G) with unlimited plan and eligible device trade-in at AT&T (Save up to $1,000)

The best Apple Black Friday deals

  • Apple TV Siri Remote (2nd Generation) on Amazon for $54.98 (Save $4.02)
  • Apple Pencil on Amazon for $79.99 (Save $19.01)
  • Apple AirTags (4-pack) on Amazon for $97.62 (Save $2.37)
  • Apple Pencil (2nd Generation) on Amazon for $99 (Save $30)
  • 2021 Apple TV HD (32GB, 5th Generation) on Amazon for $139.95 (Save $9.05)
  • 2021 Apple TV 4K (32GB) on Amazon for $169.95 (Save $9.05)
  • 2021 Apple TV 4K (64GB) on Amazon for $179.95 (Save $9.05)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time
